name: Chroma Knight
description:
Chroma Knight is a strategy based fighting game. It's main mechanic is switching between being powerful and weak states, as inspired by the limitation.

You can play it strategically, manipulating enemies to get them where you want before taking them out it a single swing (The intended way to play).

You can even try to not kill any enemy at all, or just try to go as fast as you can.

I hope you have fun, whichever way you play!

TIPS:

You can re-enter a checkpoint (flag) to save your progress again.

When you have the shield, hold it down but try to conserve energy because it will break down, but with the sword you just want to spam the left mouse button.

Get close to an enemy to wake it up, then run away to get it where you want.
